description: Paris says Turkey targeted a French frigate in the Mediterranean - a claim Ankara strongly denies.
title: Libya crisis: France suspends Nato mission role amid Turkey row
title_page: Libya crisis: France suspends Nato mission role amid Turkey row - BBC News
maintext: This latest row with France is only the latest issue to raise questions about Turkey's position within the alliance. Tensions over its approach to Libya come after similar differences between Ankara and key allies over its interventionist approach in Syria. Turkey has even held up approval of Baltic defence plans as part of this row.
